Observed at: Castlegar Airport 11:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow. Snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 9:21 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with periods of wet snow early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:21 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Snow level at valley bottom. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 9:21 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
